alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 11 at 10:45PM EST until November 12 at 1:32PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Buffalo NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New York... Cattaraugus Creek At Gowanda affecting Chautauqua, Cattaraugus, Wyoming and Erie Counties. For the Cattaraugus Creek...including Gowanda...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cattaraugus Creek At Gowanda. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flood stage, flooding along right bank a half mile to a mile downstream from Gowanda, mostly in industrial and commercial areas. Watch for developing problems along Thatcher Creek in Gowanda and at Sunset Bay at the mouth near Lake Erie. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning to 10.4 feet just after midnight tonight. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.4 feet on 03/15/2007. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1045 AM EST.
